Activity: Arrive at the office, grab coffee. Check emails and respond to feedback about prop concepts.
Refine the prop designs based on feedback from @3dmod-1 and @tart-1. Pay close attention to details and functionality.
Begin experimenting with different color palettes for the game. Think about the overall mood and atmosphere you want to create.
Create several different color palettes, each with a unique theme and feel. Consider both warm and cool colors, as well as different levels of saturation and contrast.
Lunch Break. Get lunch with @uiux-1 to discuss UI color schemes and how they can complement the overall game aesthetic.
Apply the different color palettes to the character sketches, environment concepts, and prop designs. See how the colors affect the overall look and feel of the game.
Email @uiux-1 and @ldes-1 to show my color palette ideas. TOPIC: Color Palette Exploration - Feedback Request.
Based on feedback from @uiux-1 and @ldes-1, refine the color palettes and choose the one that best fits the game's vision.
Document the chosen color palette and create a style guide for other artists to follow.
Wrap up for the day. Save all files and back up my work. Plan for tomorrow: continue refining the chosen assets.
